languages.text: {n}Дознаватель измученно потирает переносицу.{/n} "Худшего сценария и не придумаешь. Все это время на твоем корабле был прародитель ячейки генокрадов. Ксенос чудовищных психической и физической силы, обладающий абсолютной властью над культистами. Мы обязаны его уничтожить. Это вопрос уже не нашей безопасности, но безопасности Простора".

{n}Heinrix rubs the bridge of his nose in exhaustion.{/n} "This is the worst scenario imaginable. All this time, your ship has been carrying the very progenitor of the Genestealer cell. A xenos of immense psychic and physical strength who has total control over the cultists. It must be destroyed. This is no longer a question of our own safety, but rather the continued existence of the Expanse as a whole."
languages.original_text: {n}Дознаватель измученно потирает переносицу.{/n} "Худшего сценария и не придумаешь. Все это время на твоем корабле был прародитель ячейки генокрадов. languages.text: {n}海因里希疲惫地揉着鼻梁。{/n}“这可以算得上是能想象到的最糟糕的情况。这么长时间以来，基因窃取者的先祖一直潜伏在你的船上。那个异形拥有极其强大的躯体力量与精神力量，将整支邪教牢牢地控制在手中。我们必须把它摧毁，因为这已经不仅仅涉及到我们自身的安全，更涉及到科罗努斯扩区能否继续存续下去。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix rubs the bridge of his nose in exhaustion.{/n} "This is the worst scenario imaginable. All this time, your ship has been carrying the very progenitor of the Genestealer cell. A xenos of immense psychic and physical strength who has total control over the cultists. It must be destroyed. This is no longer a question of our own safety, but rather the continued existence of the Expanse as a whole."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希疲惫地揉着鼻梁。{/n}“这可以算得上是能想象到的最糟糕的情况。这么长时间以来，基因窃取者的先祖一直潜伏在你的船上。那个异形拥有极其强大的躯体力量与精神力量，将整支邪教牢牢地控制在手中。我们必须把它摧毁，因为这已经不仅仅涉及到我们自身的安全，更涉及到科罗努斯扩区能否继续存续下去。”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix se frota el puente de la nariz con gesto agotado.{/n} «Es el peor escenario imaginable. Todo este tiempo se ha estado ocultando en su nave el mismísimo progenitor de la célula Genestealer, un xenos de tremenda fuerza psíquica y física que ejerce un control absoluto sobre los cultistas. Debe ser destruido. Ya no es nuestra propia seguridad la que está en juego, sino la de toda la Extensión».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix rubs the bridge of his nose in exhaustion.{/n} "This is the worst scenario imaginable. All this time, your ship has been carrying the very progenitor of the Genestealer cell. A xenos of immense psychic and physical strength who has total control over the cultists. It must be destroyed. This is no longer a question of our own safety, but rather the continued existence of the Expanse as a whole."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix se frota el puente de la nariz con gesto agotado.{/n} «Es el peor escenario imaginable. Todo este tiempo se ha estado ocultando en su nave el mismísimo progenitor de la célula Genestealer, un xenos de tremenda fuerza psíquica y física que ejerce un control absoluto sobre los cultistas. Debe ser destruido. Ya no es nuestra propia seguridad la que está en juego, sino la de toda la Extensión».

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは疲労のあまり鼻の下をこすった。{/n} 「最悪のシナリオです。あなたの船はずっと、ジーンスティーラー細胞の始祖を乗せてきた。巨大な精神力と肉体を持ち、カルト信者たちを完全に支配している異種族です。彼らを破壊しなければなりません。これは我々自身の安全の問題ではなく、エクスパンス全体の存続の問題です」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix rubs the bridge of his nose in exhaustion.{/n} "This is the worst scenario imaginable. All this time, your ship has been carrying the very progenitor of the Genestealer cell. A xenos of immense psychic and physical strength who has total control over the cultists. It must be destroyed. This is no longer a question of our own safety, but rather the continued existence of the Expanse as a whole."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは疲労のあまり鼻の下をこすった。{/n} 「最悪のシナリオです。あなたの船はずっと、ジーンスティーラー細胞の始祖を乗せてきた。巨大な精神力と肉体を持ち、カルト信者たちを完全に支配している異種族です。彼らを破壊しなければなりません。これは我々自身の安全の問題ではなく、エクスパンス全体の存続の問題です」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix reibt sich erschöpft den Rücken seiner Nase.{/n} "Das ist das schlimmste denkbare Szenario. Der Stammvater der Symbiontenzelle war die ganze Zeit auf Eurem Schiff. Ein Xenos mit immenser psychischer und physischer Stärke, der die Kultisten vollständig kontrolliert. Er muss vernichtet werden. Das ist längst keine Frage Eurer eigenen Sicherheit mehr. Es geht vielmehr um die Existenz der Ausdehnung als Ganzes."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix rubs the bridge of his nose in exhaustion.{/n} "This is the worst scenario imaginable. All this time, your ship has been carrying the very progenitor of the Genestealer cell. A xenos of immense psychic and physical strength who has total control over the cultists. It must be destroyed. This is no longer a question of our own safety, but rather the continued existence of the Expanse as a whole."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix reibt sich erschöpft den Rücken seiner Nase.{/n} "Das ist das schlimmste denkbare Szenario. Der Stammvater der Symbiontenzelle war die ganze Zeit auf Eurem Schiff. Ein Xenos mit immenser psychischer und physischer Stärke, der die Kultisten vollständig kontrolliert. Er muss vernichtet werden. Das ist längst keine Frage Eurer eigenen Sicherheit mehr. Es geht vielmehr um die Existenz der Ausdehnung als Ganzes."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix se frotte le nez d'un air las.{/n} « C'est le pire scénario que l'on puisse imaginer. Depuis tout ce temps, votre vaisseau transporte à son bord le fondateur de cette cellule Genestealer. Un xénos aux pouvoirs psychiques et à la force physique considérables, qui tient les cultistes sous sa coupe. Il faut l'éliminer à tout prix. Plus que votre seule sécurité, c'est l'avenir des Étendues dans leur ensemble qui est en jeu. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix rubs the bridge of his nose in exhaustion.{/n} "This is the worst scenario imaginable. All this time, your ship has been carrying the very progenitor of the Genestealer cell. A xenos of immense psychic and physical strength who has total control over the cultists. It must be destroyed. This is no longer a question of our own safety, but rather the continued existence of the Expanse as a whole."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix se frotte le nez d'un air las.{/n} « C'est le pire scénario que l'on puisse imaginer. Depuis tout ce temps, votre vaisseau transporte à son bord le fondateur de cette cellule Genestealer. Un xénos aux pouvoirs psychiques et à la force physique considérables, qui tient les cultistes sous sa coupe. Il faut l'éliminer à tout prix. Plus que votre seule sécurité, c'est l'avenir des Étendues dans leur ensemble qui est en jeu. »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, bitkin bir hâlde burun kemiğini ovuşturuyor.{/n} "Olabilecek en kötü senaryo gerçek oldu. Gemin, tüm bu zaman boyunca Gençalan hücresinin yegâne atasını taşıyormuş. Tarikatçılar üzerinde mutlak kontrol bulunduran, muazzam bir ruhsezi ve beden gücüne sahip bir zeno. Artık bu husus, sadece bizim güvenliğimizle ilgili olmaktan çıktı. Enginlik'in bir bütün olarak varlığını sürdürmesiyle ilgili bir mesele bu."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix rubs the bridge of his nose in exhaustion.{/n} "This is the worst scenario imaginable. All this time, your ship has been carrying the very progenitor of the Genestealer cell. A xenos of immense psychic and physical strength who has total control over the cultists. It must be destroyed. This is no longer a question of our own safety, but rather the continued existence of the Expanse as a whole."
